summary: The Contoso Wireless tv is a high-quality HDTV that offers a range of features and benefits, such as 4K resolution, HDR support, Dolby Atmos audio, built-in Wi-Fi and Ethernet ports, a suite of accessories and services, and a warranty. It usually ships within 2-3 business days, and customers can also pick up one at one of the retail locations if they need it right away.
